Posts.Title: Cancer smell

Posts.Content: yes, i have noticed a smell on my body as well, one that i cant descibe that well and its a stench.... i get constant remarks from fello in emp. that are pretty mean.. however i have not been officially diagnosed with anything yet.. i have a high cea level 8.ng /ml i dont really know what is going on yet, but i know this body odor is foul and its deffinitely not a good thing when you body smells this bad all of a sudden. any advice from anyone would be appreciated. i do walk 15min to 20 min aday when i have energy im only 38 and i feel lathargic and my hair is falling out... ty for you time
